001// Copyright (c) FIRST and other WPILib contributors.
002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of
003// the WPILib BSD license file in the root directory of this project.
004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.apriltag;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonAutoDetect;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
012import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose3d;
013import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation3d;
014import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation3d;
015import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation;
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.nio.file.Path;
018import java.util.ArrayList;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Objects;
021import java.util.Optional;
022
023/**
024 * Class for representing a layout of AprilTags on a field and reading them from a JSON format.
025 *
026 * <p>The JSON format contains two top-level objects, "tags" and "field". The "tags" object is a
027 * list of all AprilTags contained within a layout. Each AprilTag serializes to a JSON object
028 * containing an ID and a Pose3d. The "field" object is a descriptor of the size of the field in
029 * meters with "width" and "height" values. This is to account for arbitrary field sizes when
030 * mirroring the poses.
031 *
032 * <p>Pose3ds are assumed to be measured from the bottom-left corner of the field, when the blue
033 * alliance is at the left. Pose3ds will automatically be returned as passed in when calling {@link
034 * AprilTagFieldLayout#getTagPose(int)}. Setting an alliance color via {@link
035 * AprilTagFieldLayout#setAlliance(DriverStation.Alliance)} will mirror the poses returned from
036 * {@link AprilTagFieldLayout#getTagPose(int)} to be correct relative to the other alliance.
037 */
038@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
039@JsonAutoDetect(getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
040public class AprilTagFieldLayout {
041  @JsonProperty(value = "tags")
042  private final List<AprilTag> m_apriltags = new ArrayList<>();
043
044  @JsonProperty(value = "field")
045  private FieldDimensions m_fieldDimensions;
046
047  private boolean m_mirror;
048
049  /**
050   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout with values imported from a JSON file.
051   *
052   * @param path Path of the JSON file to import from.
053   * @throws IOException If reading from the file fails.
054   */
055  public AprilTagFieldLayout(String path) throws IOException {
056    this(Path.of(path));
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout with values imported from a JSON file.
061   *
062   * @param path Path of the JSON file to import from.
063   * @throws IOException If reading from the file fails.
064   */
065  public AprilTagFieldLayout(Path path) throws IOException {
066    AprilTagFieldLayout layout =
067        new ObjectMapper().readValue(path.toFile(), AprilTagFieldLayout.class);
068    m_apriltags.addAll(layout.m_apriltags);
069    m_fieldDimensions = layout.m_fieldDimensions;
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Construct a new AprilTagFieldLayout from a list of {@link AprilTag} objects.
074   *
075   * @param apriltags List of {@link AprilTag}.
076   * @param fieldLength Length of the field in meters.
077   * @param fieldWidth Width of the field in meters.
078   */
079  public AprilTagFieldLayout(List<AprilTag> apriltags, double fieldLength, double fieldWidth) {
080    this(apriltags, new FieldDimensions(fieldLength, fieldWidth));
081  }
082
083  @JsonCreator
084  private AprilTagFieldLayout(
085      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "tags") List<AprilTag> apriltags,
086      @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "field") FieldDimensions fieldDimensions) {
087    // To ensure the underlying semantics don't change with what kind of list is passed in
088    m_apriltags.addAll(apriltags);
089    m_fieldDimensions = fieldDimensions;
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Set the alliance that your team is on.
094   *
095   * <p>This changes the {@link #getTagPose(int)} method to return the correct pose for your
096   * alliance.
097   *
098   * @param alliance The alliance to mirror poses for.
099   */
100  public void setAlliance(DriverStation.Alliance alliance) {
101    m_mirror = alliance == DriverStation.Alliance.Red;
102  }
103
104  /**
105   * Gets an AprilTag pose by its ID.
106   *
107   * @param ID The ID of the tag.
108   * @return The pose corresponding to the ID passed in or an empty optional if a tag with that ID
109   *     was not found.
110   */
111  @SuppressWarnings("ParameterName")
112  public Optional<Pose3d> getTagPose(int ID) {
113    Pose3d pose = null;
114    for (AprilTag apriltag : m_apriltags) {
115      if (apriltag.ID == ID) {
116        pose = apriltag.pose;
117        break;
118      }
119    }
120    if (pose == null) {
121      return Optional.empty();
122    }
123    if (m_mirror) {
124      pose =
125          pose.relativeTo(
126              new Pose3d(
127                  new Translation3d(
128                      m_fieldDimensions.fieldWidth, m_fieldDimensions.fieldLength, 0.0),
129                  new Rotation3d(0.0, 0.0, Math.PI)));
130    }
131    return Optional.of(pose);
132  }
133
134  /**
135   * Serializes a AprilTagFieldLayout to a JSON file.
136   *
137   * @param path The path to write to.
138   * @throws IOException If writing to the file fails.
139   */
140  public void serialize(String path) throws IOException {
141    serialize(Path.of(path));
142  }
143
144  /**
145   * Serializes a AprilTagFieldLayout to a JSON file.
146   *
147   * @param path The path to write to.
148   * @throws IOException If writing to the file fails.
149   */
150  public void serialize(Path path) throws IOException {
151    new ObjectMapper().writeValue(path.toFile(), this);
152  }
153
154  @Override
155  public boolean equals(Object obj) {
156    if (obj instanceof AprilTagFieldLayout) {
157      var other = (AprilTagFieldLayout) obj;
158      return m_apriltags.equals(other.m_apriltags) && m_mirror == other.m_mirror;
159    }
160    return false;
161  }
162
163  @Override
164  public int hashCode() {
165    return Objects.hash(m_apriltags, m_mirror);
166  }
167
168  @JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
169  @JsonAutoDetect(getterVisibility = JsonAutoDetect.Visibility.NONE)
170  private static class FieldDimensions {
171    @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
172    @JsonProperty(value = "width")
173    public double fieldWidth;
174
175    @SuppressWarnings("MemberName")
176    @JsonProperty(value = "height")
177    public double fieldLength;
178
179    @JsonCreator()
180    FieldDimensions(
181        @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "width") double fieldWidth,
182        @JsonProperty(required = true, value = "height") double fieldLength) {
183      this.fieldWidth = fieldWidth;
184      this.fieldLength = fieldLength;
185    }
186  }
187}
